dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT sprov.servprov_xid carrier, sh.shipment_xid shipment_id, b.stat_name ship_status, sref1.shipment_refnum_value loc, sref2.shipment_refnum_value item_name, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(sh.start_time,sh.source_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YYYY') pickup_date, loc1.location_name origin_name, loc1.city origin_city, loc1.province_code origin_state, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(sh.end_time,sh.dest_location_gid),'dd-mm-rr'), 'MM/DD/YYYY') delivery_date, loc2.location_name delivery_name, loc2.province_code delivery_state, tm.transport_mode_xid trans_mode, REPLACE(sv.status_value_xid,'ENROUTE_','') enroute_status, REPLACE(sh.insert_user,'SCOULAR/FOOD.','') planner FROM (SELECT a.shipment_gid, LISTAGG(a.shipstat, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY a.shipstat) stat_name FROM (SELECT s.shipment_gid, 'Pickup Late' shipstat FROM shipment s INNER JOIN servprov sp ON s.servprov_gid = sp.servprov_gid AND sp.servprov_xid NOT IN ('FOBCARR','SPOT BID CARRIER') INNER JOIN shipment_type st ON s.shipment_type_gid = st.shipment_type_gid AND st.shipment_type_xid = 'TRANSPORT' AND NOT st.shipment_type_xid = 'NON FREIGHT RELATED CHARGE' WHERE s.start_time BETWEEN (SYSDATE + (-3649.75)) AND (SYSDATE + (-0.75)) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.perspective = 'B' AND (s.shipment_gid IN (SELECT sstat.shipment_gid FROM status_value sv INNER JOIN shipment_status sstat ON sv.status_value_gid = sstat.status_value_gid WHERE sv.status_value_xid = 'ENROUTE_NOT STARTED')) UNION SELECT s.shipment_gid, 'Delivery Late' shipstat FROM shipment s INNER JOIN servprov sp ON s.servprov_gid = sp.servprov_gid AND sp.servprov_xid NOT IN ('FOBCARR','SPOT BID CARRIER') INNER JOIN shipment_type st ON s.shipment_type_gid = st.shipment_type_gid AND st.shipment_type_xid = 'TRANSPORT' AND NOT st.shipment_type_xid = 'NON FREIGHT RELATED CHARGE' WHERE s.end_time BETWEEN (SYSDATE + (-3649.75)) AND (SYSDATE + (-0.75)) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.perspective = 'B' AND (s.shipment_gid IN (SELECT sstat.shipment_gid FROM status_value statv INNER JOIN shipment_status sstat ON statv.status_value_gid = sstat.status_value_gid WHERE statv.status_value_xid IN ('ENROUTE_DELAYED','ENROUTE_DIVERTED','ENROUTE_ENROUTE','ENROUTE_MERGED','ENROUTE_NOT STARTED','ENROUTE_PARTIAL','ENROUTE_UNLOADED - FULL','ENROUTE_UNLOADED - PARTIAL')))) a GROUP BY a.shipment_gid) b INNER JOIN shipment sh ON b.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN servprov sprov ON sh.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sh.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON sh.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON sh.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN transport_mode tm ON sh.transport_mode_gid = tm.transport_mode_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_status ss ON sh.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid AND ss.status_type_gid = 'SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE' LEFT OUTER JOIN status_value sv ON ss.status_value_gid = sv.status_value_gid WHERE sh.servprov_gid NOT IN ( SELECT SUBSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID=')+11,25),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID=')+11,25),'&')-1) servprov_gid FROM process_control_request WHERE TOPIC_CLASS_NAME='glog.server.workflow.adhoc.ScheduleReportTopic' AND INSTR(topic_parameters,'CARRIER_ID') > 0 ) ORDER BY sh.start_time
